Package components.inventory

Interface Inventory.Item

All Known Implementing Classes:
InventorySecondary.BasicItem
Enclosing interface:
Inventory
public static interface Inventory.Item
Representation of a single item in the Inventory.

    Field

    Constant for count tag.
    static final String

  • Field Details

    • COUNT

      static final String COUNT
      Constant for count tag. An item is guaranteed to have this tag.

      • Constant Field Values

      static final String EMPTY_NAME
      Constant for empty item name.

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns whether this is an empty Item.
      Returns:
      whether this is empty.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name/identifier of this Item.
      Returns:
      the name of this.

    • getTags

      Map<String,Integer> getTags()
      Returns the tags associated with this Item.
      Returns:
      the tags of this.

    • hasTag

      boolean hasTag(String tag)
      Returns whether this Item has the tag tag.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to check this for.
      Returns:
      true if the Item has the tag tag and false otherwise.

    • putTag

      void putTag(String tag, int tagVal)
      If the tag is not already present, adds the (tag,value) pair to this Item, otherwise updates the value associated with the tag.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to add / update
      tagVal - the tag value to add / update

    • removeTag

      void removeTag(String tag)
      Removes tag from this Item.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to remove from this

    • tagValue

      int tagValue(String tag)
      Returns the integer tag value associated with tag.
      Parameters:
      tag - The tag to get the associated value of.
      Returns:
      The integer value associated with tag.
